name: Quick Maths
description: A web app that helps you practice your mental maths skills. It generates random maths questions and gives you a score based on your performance.

name: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills.

name: Game of Life
description: A desktop app that simulates Conway's Game of Life, a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway

name: Gene rEvoution
description: A video game where you play as a soldier tasked with clearing out den of mutated creatures. You can upgrade your weapons by using points earned from killing enemies.

name: Snake Game
description: A simple snake game where you control a snake to eat food and grow longer. The game ends when the snake collides with itself or the walls.

name: PDF Plagiarism Checker
description: A desktop app where you can check if a collection of PDF files have plagiarised each other. It uses a custom algorithm to check for similarities between the files.
